Tags: Literature & Fiction, Mystery, Thriller & Suspense, Crime, Noir
Publisher: Mike Dennis (August 1, 2013)
Language: English
ASIN: B00EAE70TG


Overview:
In the world of small-time bookie Eddie Ryan, only the cop cars are black and white. Everything else swirls in a kind of gray soup. Overcome by greed, lust, and the survival instinct, Eddie takes part in a high-stakes heist, stepping into a morally treacherous world where no one can be trusted, and where life expectancy is short.
Set in the dim half-light of the Houston and New Orleans demimondes, THE TAKE is a fast-paced, nerve-jangling ride.
The book includes a preview of SETUP ON FRONT STREET, the first novel in Mike Dennis' Key West Nocturnes Series, a group of novels designed to reveal Key West as a true noir city. The series takes the reader behind the margaritas and the sunshine to the dark shadows and alleys of Key West, where the tourists never go.
